LanguageData.CTSAdvancedMedicineLab.label: Advanced Medicine Laboratory
LanguageData.CTSAdvancedMedicineLab.description: You can craft bandages, medicine, glitterworld medicine, nano-tech medicine.
LanguageData.CTSAdvancedVitalsMonitor.label: Advanced vitals monitor
LanguageData.CTSAdvancedVitalsMonitor.description: Very Increases patients treatment quality. Needs to be placed adjacent to a Hi-tech medical bed. One Hi-tech medical bed can be linked to only one Advanced vitals monitor.
LanguageData.CTSHiTechHospitalBed.label: Hi-tech Hospital Beds
LanguageData.CTSHiTechHospitalBed.description: A hi-tech bed specially designed for brutal surgery. Very improves chance of successful medical work.
